title: Dynamic Background
body: Can someone explain why my dynamic background is of Soraka? I don't have her played at all in my last 20 games and have a low mastery rank with her. Thanks!

replies.body: Got it, thanks for the help!

Ahhhhh y'know, that might be happening from how often you played Soraka during the Star Guardian mode tbh. It looks like you played her quite a bit in that mode and it must have skewed the data on the backend. After enough matches, you should see it return to normal.
